page.title: 11Government-Witton&Ridlington
page.content: Ridlington is part of the civil parish of Witton falling in the area administered by N.Norfolk District Council.Witton & Ridlington Parish Council has 8members,meeting quarterly Civil defence plans in case of nuclear attack are under consideration. {Precept}The parish council rents out common land to 2 local farmers.This provides the basis of parish council income so there is no parish rate.This pays the salary of the Parish Clerk & day to day expenses. {Charities}Trustees are appointed by the Parish Coucil to manage 3 charities for the benefit of the people of Witton.One is Annison's Charity consisting of land near Mill Farm;2nd is the Richard Drake charity of 1649;3rd is the John Norris Charity.
